rules_text:
{1}{W}: If Finnei isn’t a cleric, she becomes a 2/2 Human Cleric and gains healing 2. [i](This creature dealing damage causes you to gain 2 life.)[/i]
{3}{W}: If Finnei is a Cleric, she becomes a 3/3 Angel and gains flying.
{5}{W}: If Finnei is an Angel, she becomes a Demigod and gains double strike and “Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Finnei.”
